instructions: Enable developer mode on your Chromebook. Enable Android apps on your Chromebook. Navigate to Settings > Google Play Store > Manage Android Preferences . Tap Security . Tap Unknown Sources . Navigate to fortnite.com/android using an Android device and save EpicGamesApp.apk when prompted. Connect your Android phone to your Chromebook with a USB cable, and transfer EpicGamesApp.apk to your Chromebook. Run EpicGamesApp.apk on your Chromebook. Click Package Installer . Click or tap Install . Click or tap Open . Click or tap Install . Complete the installation, and start playing Fortnite.
